div.p:
SCHOOL CLOSED
March 16th – at least May 15th

Student two week packets for grades K-5 are
available on the tab FOR PARENTS
under Parent and Student Resources
Student Online Educational Video Conferencing Program will begin Wednesday March 18th

h1.strong: Riverhead Charter School is a public school of choice, with no tuition, serving families of Kindergarten through Eighth grade students on Eastern Long Island. We offer a private school environment in a public school setting.

Riverhead Charter School
3685 Middle Country Road, Calverton, NY 11933
(631) 369-5800
Contact Us

p.span: As of Monday, March 23rd, we will no longer be providing lunch grab-and-go at Riverhead Charter School or breakfast deliveries.

With the evolving news around COVID-19, a new executive order from Governor Andrew M. Cuomo to keep all staff and families safe, we had to make substantial changes to our food service program and further do not allow any staff members and visitors to enter our campus.
We will continue to monitor this situation closely and let you know if/when there are any additional changes.
Keep up to date with Remind/Class Dojo, as we will be sending updates around any additional resources that may be in your community.
Stay safe and continue to reach out to the main office number if you need anything.

div.p: Click Here for Online Learning Resources.

hr.p: District Conformation Form and Transportation Application submission deadline has been extended.

Riverhead Charter School is still accepting student applications for School Year 2020-21. Application deadline is April 1, 2020. If you would like to submit an application, please do so using our online form. Having problems submitting application online? Please call our office for assistance 631-369-5800.
